```{r setup, include=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(flexdashboard)
  library(dplyr)
  library(leaflet)
})
```





# FBOs for sale

```{r data}
# Fetch data and save locally
dat <- data.frame(
  lon=c(50, -50) , 
  lat=c(-50, 50),
  label = letters[1:2],
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```

```{r map}
dat %>%
  mutate(
    popup = label
  ) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat, label = ~popup)
```
